mapper.select: SELECT stu.studentId, stu.student, stu.name, sum( CASE WHEN co.class = "Chinese" THEN co.score END ) AS Chinese, sum( CASE WHEN co.class = "Math" THEN co.score END ) AS Math, sum( CASE WHEN co.class = "English" THEN co.score END ) AS English, sum( CASE WHEN co.class = "History" THEN co.score END ) AS History, sum( CASE WHEN co.class = "生物" THEN co.score END ) AS Biological, sum( co.score ) AS TotalScore FROM student AS stu LEFT JOIN courses AS co ON stu.student = co.student GROUP BY stu.studentId, stu.student, stu.name ORDER BY TotalScore DESC
